Resources for Wigs and Hairpieces

At Memorial Sloan Kettering Cancer Center, we understand that it can be difficult to experience hair loss. Below, you will find resources for wigs and hairpieces.

Financial Support

American Cancer Society www.cancer.org Some American Cancer Society offices offer free wigs to cancer patients. If you are interested in this service, go to your local American Cancer Society office or call (800) 227-2345. Cancer Care www.cancercare.org Cancer care offers free wigs to cancer patients. Call (800) 813-4673 and ask to speak to a social worker.
